#summary Golf Markup Langauge Reference: GolfCourse

= Definition =

A GolfCourse represent a set of playable holes of golf.

= Attributes =

The GolfCourse element has the following attributes:

 # id - Unique Identifier
 #  holes - Number of holes of the course.

= Elements =

== Descriptives Elements ==

The GolfCourse element contains the following descriptives elements:

 # Name
 # Note

== Structural Elements ==

The GolfCourse element main contains the following structural elements:

 # [[Media]] - Generic media element related to the golf course.
 # [[Holes]]
 # [[Tees]]

= Notes =

We should limit the number of holes of a course to 9 or 18.
